title: Stage Lv8-C4-S21
description: Level 8 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: The manager, as we all know, is very experienced.
The project, I must admit, exceeded our expectations.
learning_points: Level 8 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 매니저는, 우리 모두가 알고 있듯이, 매우 경험이 풍부합니다.
sentences.en: The manager, as we all know, is very experienced.

sentences.kr: 그 프로젝트는, 인정해야 하지만, 우리의 기대를 뛰어넘었습니다.
sentences.en: The project, I must admit, exceeded our expectations.

sentences.kr: 이 해결책은, 믿기 어렵겠지만, 실제로 꽤 잘 작동합니다.
sentences.en: This solution, believe it or not, actually works quite well.

sentences.kr: 그 결정은, 솔직히 말해서, 매우 현명했습니다.
sentences.en: That decision, to be honest, was very wise.

sentences.kr: 새로운 시스템은, 예상했던 대로, 효율성을 크게 향상시켰습니다.
sentences.en: The new system, as expected, greatly improved efficiency.
The proposal, surprisingly enough, was approved unanimously.
This method, as you can see, is very effective.

sentences.kr: 그들의 노력은, 말할 필요도 없이, 성과로 이어졌습니다.
sentences.en: Their efforts, needless to say, led to success.
